reviewText:
Read anime fans synopsis. This show is a harem anime with some skin and suggestive references from time to time. The island of single female women are always chasing him. He of coarse eventually makes friends with several and Suzu being the main potential love interest. The woman are all created following different common stereotypes. There is Shrine maiden, Bookworm, Ninja, Shy girl, Animal lover, Super shy girl, etc. This show is a Comedy. The subtitled versions vary and make sure you can read the signs. Some don't have the signs translated and a lot of jokes are there. I watched first time without signs and was so-so about it. Second time was way better. I still laugh at this show today. Voice acting in Jap version is really good. This is much milder than To Love Ru and Kissxs.. Screen resolution is DVD 480p and looks a bit fuzzy and stretched out on my 50" TV.

Techies watch using PC and MPC-HC player (free) with Options>Shaders>'16-235 to 0-255 [SD][HD]' colors enabled and 'Sharpen complex 2'. This makes it match nicer on the PC linked TV.

The story is Ikuto (the main character) gets into a fight with his stepdad and runs away from home. He boards a ship and on it a terrible storm happens causing him to go overboard. As he is sinking the sea dragon god takes pity on him and sends him to Airiantou and when he wakes up he finds himself as the only man on the island surrounded by wirlpools thus trapping him in. He meets Suzu, the only girl living by herself and she puts up a tough front but deep down she is quite lonely. After complications he ends up moving in with her.

Basicly guy gets washed up on an island full of women (he tries to escape but can't) and gets chased, captured, and darted there's the hide and seek groom thing thats prety funny. I'd reccomend this to anyone who likes harem or just fun anime.
